fees.description: A $2.20 (inc. GST) charge will apply to paper bills sent in the post.
You may be charged a 0.32% merchant service fee for paying by Visa or Mastercard (unless you pay via direct debit)
A fee of $12 may apply for payments made after the due date (GST exempt).

electricityContract.terms: For further details on the information presented in this Plan Information Document, or for full terms and conditions, please visit www.engie.com.au or call ENGIE on 13 88 08. All time-dependent rates (eg. 4pm to 8pm) are billed in AEST.

discounts.description: You'll receive a 5% guaranteed discount off our electricity usage and supply charges.

electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates and charges at any time, including if any underlying information is incorrect, you get a new meter or your distributor changes your tariff. We'll give you advance notice of any change, which may be on your bill.

incentives.description: Your offer includes a one-off welcome credit of $150, on your first electricity bill, provided you have not received a welcome credit from us in the past 12 months. This credit includes GST and is not redeemable for cash.
Your My NRMA membership will be complimentary, a program that helps inspire you to explore new places and experiences, great deals on fuel, shopping, travel, entertainment and more along the way.

eligibility.description: You must agree to the NRMA T&Cs and Privacy Policy, available at mynrma.com.au; and provide a valid email address. Offer not available for current My NRMA members.

singleRate.description: Separately metered usage. The hours of application are determined by your Distributor.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Ongoing energy plan until you or we end it. We may end this energy plan at any time by giving you 20 Business Days' notice.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees may apply. For information please contact us on 13 88 08.
